entries.abort: Arr, you can't leave us now mate! Those TIE's will eat us alive!
entries.angry_disable: You're crazy if you think you can get away with this Rebel!
entries.arrival_phase_1: Alright Rebel, waiting for word of a position from our men. Stand by.
entries.arrival_phase_2: They have arrived, intercept them! I will keep their position updated as fast as I can.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.capture_complete: Nym Command Officer: < Alright, get ready to move out! >
entries.capture_phase_1_1: Good job, we're taking over this ship! Put 'em out of their misery men!
entries.capture_phase_1_5: Touch those guns and you die! This ship now belongs to Nym!
entries.capture_phase_2_1: We're breaking down the door to the bridge now. The ship will be ours in a few seconds!
entries.capture_phase_2_4: We are in contr.. take that Imperial scum! Well almost in control. Give us a few more seconds.
entries.capture_phase_2_5: I could do this all day, nothing better than stealing from the Empire!
entries.capture_started: Nym Command Officer: < Our boys are getting rid of the crew now, stand by. >
entries.complete: It's party time boys! We're out of here!
entries.complete_1: It's party time boys! We're out of here!
entries.complete_2: Good job everyone, most fun I've had all week!
entries.complete_3: Let me hear you boys! Nym! Nym! Nym!
entries.complete_4: That's it? They barely put up any resistance at all!
entries.complete_5: Only problem with space combat, I don't get to eat my victims! Oh well, we're out of here.
entries.escort_remaining: Nym Command Officer: < %DI to go. You need to take those ships out to ensure the safety of our boys! >
entries.escort_wiped_out: Nym Command Officer: < Good job. That should make this a lot easier. >
entries.failed_destroy: Dangit pilot! We lost all those men! You got some explaining to do. Return to base!
entries.failed_escape: They got away! Rebels..sigh. Oh well, we'll get them next time.
entries.panic_1: Here comes their buddies, lets rock these guys!
entries.panic_2: TIE ships incoming. Good, wouldn't want to leave here without a real fight!
entries.panic_3: The Empire has arrived, let's give them a warm welcome!
entries.panic_4: Those TIE's don't look friendly, I wonder why?
entries.panic_5: Finally some real action. Arm your weapons buddy, time to play!
entries.quest_disable_d: Proceed to the coordinates we provide you with, destroy the escort of the Imperial troop transport and disable it.
entries.quest_escort_d: Once the transport is ours, escort it to the pre-determined coordinates safely.
entries.quest_location_d: We are not sure why but the Endor system has gathered and immense amount of the Imperial Navy lately and you need to stay sharp while performing missions in it.
entries.quest_recover_d: Our superior pirates are about to take control of the vessel. Keep it safe from interference by Imperial forces while they are crushing all resistance.
entries.recovery_success: Nice work pilot, our boys are safe!
entries.target_disabled: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel disabled. >
entries.taunt_1: You filthy pirates, you will pay for this!
entries.taunt_2: You really expected to get away with this?!
entries.taunt_3: Rebels or Nym, no matter, you're all scum!
entries.taunt_4: This joyride ends here you fools!
entries.taunt_5: Surrender immediately or you will all be destroyed!
entries.thanks_2: Great job everyone! If we get back to Lok, we need to throw one heck of a party!
entries.thanks_3: Bah, they hardly put up a fight!
entries.thanks_4: Is that all the Empire got?
entries.thanks_5: It's over already? Hopefully they'll send some more our way...haha!
entries.title: Endor system: Duty mission: Help Nym pirates hijack Imperial troop transports.
entries.title_d: We are striking an attack against the heavy Imperial presence in the Endor system. We have infiltrated a bunch of their troop transports with our men and they need your assistance in disabling the ships and taking out their escort. When you feel that you have exhausted your ship, yourself or that you have enough experience to continue your training, you can return to base at anytime.
